name: Forget Me Not (Xetrovia, Razeacc, Carina, Knoxulla, Arthur Senna)
name_original: Forget Me Not (Xetrovia, Razeacc, Carina, Knoxulla, Arthur Senna)
description:
The passage of time is a peculiar thing. The cycle of existence ticks ever forward but….do you follow? Journey through your own consciousness as it falls down around you.

Created for Centennial College 2022 winter game jam

created by 

Arthur Senna- Project manager/programming

Knox- Fouladi Programming/ animation

Jenny Sherwood- 3D art/animation

Carina Choy - Level design/ 2D art

Nate Baricuatro - Audio
